TEXT: Some #yHydrologist cards are tied to a completely separate card. When a #ySwappable card is in your hand, you can hover or hold it with your mouse and press the #ySwap key (default space, configurable) to switch the card to its #yPaired card.
LABEL: Swappables

TEXT: A central #yHydrologist mechanic is the interactions between #yHeat, #yCold, and #yThermal #yShock. NL NL Apply #yHeat to an enemy to make it #yHot, and it takes 30% more damage. NL NL Apply #yCold to an enemy to make it #yCool, and it deals 15% less damage.
Build up #yHeat or #yCold on an enemy, then apply the opposite to inflict #yThermal #yShock, causing that enemy to lose health equal to 3 times the amount you built up.
While suffering from #yThermal #yShock, any additional triggers of #yHeat or #yCold deal additional damage equal to the thermal shock amount.
LABEL: Next

TEXT: Some cards care about another card's #ySubtype. Every #yHydrologist card, except for strikes and defends, have a #ySubtype assigned to them, either #yIce, #yWater, or #ySteam. To tell these subtypes apart, there are unique visual indicators.
LABEL: Subtypes
